revised_title: Spectroscopic Observations of the Sun: New Insights into Prominences and Solar Activity
tldr: The author presents new spectroscopic observations of the Sun, focusing on the behavior of prominences and their connection to solar activity. The study reveals two classes of prominences, with one class exhibiting intense action and the other being tranquil. The findings provide insights into the nature of prominences and their relationship to solar storms and faculae.
